text: 2|74|phir ye (nishaaniyaan dekhane) ke baad tumhaare dil pattharon ke samaan ya unase bhee adhik kathor ho gaye; kyonki pattharon mein kuchh aise hote hain, jinase naharen phoot padatee hain aur kuchh phat jaate hain aur unase paanee nikal aata hai aur kuchh allaah ke dar se gir padate hain aur allaah tumhaare karatooton se nishchet nahin hai.
